description: A script for generating BIANCA masks

overlay_flag.title: Overlay flag
overlay_flag.description: Generate brain surface outline overlaid onto original image

no_seg_output_flag.title: No segmented brain image flag
no_seg_output_flag.description: Don't generate segmented brain image output

fractional_intensity.title: Fractional intensity threshold
fractional_intensity.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); default=0.5; smaller values give larger brain outline estimates

vg_fractional_intensity.title: Vertical gradient fractional intensity threshold
vg_fractional_intensity.description: Vertical gradient in fractional intensity threshold (-1->1); default=0; positive values give larger brain outline at bottom, smaller at top

head_radius.title: Head Radius
head_radius.description: Head radius (mm not voxels); initial surface sphere is set to half of this

center_of_gravity.title: Center of Gravity
center_of_gravity.description: Centre-of-gravity (voxels not mm) of initial mesh surface.

thresholding_flag.title: Threshold segmented image flag
thresholding_flag.description: Apply thresholding to segmented brain image and mask

vtk_mesh.title: VTK format brain surface mesh flag
vtk_mesh.description: Generates brain surface as mesh in .vtk format

robust_iters_flag.title: Robust iterations flag
robust_iters_flag.description: Robust brain center estimation (iterates BET several times)

residual_optic_cleanup_flag.title: Residual optic cleanup flag
residual_optic_cleanup_flag.description: Eye & optic nerve cleanup (can be useful in SIENA - disables -o option)

reduce_bias_flag.title: Bias reduction flag
reduce_bias_flag.description: Bias field & neck cleanup (can be useful in SIENA)

slice_padding_flag.title: Slice padding flag
slice_padding_flag.description: Improve BET if FOV is very small in Z (by temporarily padding end slices)

whole_set_mask_flag.title: Mask-whole-set flag
whole_set_mask_flag.description: Apply to 4D FMRI data (uses -f 0.3 and dilates brain mask slightly)

additional_surfaces_flag.title: Additional surfaces flag
additional_surfaces_flag.description: Run bet2 and then betsurf to get additional skull and scalp surfaces (includes registrations)

additional_surfaces_t2.title: Additional surfaces with T2
additional_surfaces_t2.description: As with -A, when also feeding in non-brain-extracted T2 (includes registrations)
